title: Spaghetti, Chicken & Bacon Dish
directions: In a large bowl stir together the chicken, spaghetti, soup, chicken stock, some of the bacon, 1 c. cheese and salt and pepper.
Pour into a greased 9×13″ pan. Bake covered at 350 degrees F for 20 minutes. Uncover and top with 1/2 c. cheese and the rest of the bacon and bake 10 minutes more.
